org.fujion.model

Class Paginator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.model.Paginator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaginator

    public class Paginator
extends Object
implements IPaginator
    Simple implementation of a paginator that can notify subscribers when a property value has changed.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.fujion.model.IPaginator

    • Method Detail

      • getPageSize

        public int getPageSize()
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Returns the number of model objects in a single page. A value of <= 0 means that paging is disabled.
        Specified by:
        getPageSize in interface IPaginator
        Returns:
        The page size.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.getPageSize()

      • setPageSize

        public void setPageSize(int pageSize)
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Sets the number of model objects in a single page. A value of <= 0 disabled paging.
        Specified by:
        setPageSize in interface IPaginator
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The page size.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.setPageSize(int)

      • getCurrentPage

        public int getCurrentPage()
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Returns the index of the current page. Will always return 0 if paging is disabled.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentPage in interface IPaginator
        Returns:
        The current page.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.getCurrentPage()

      • setCurrentPage

        public void setCurrentPage(int pageIndex)
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Sets the index of the current page. Has no effect if paging is disabled.
        Specified by:
        setCurrentPage in interface IPaginator
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - Index of the page to become the current page.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.setCurrentPage(int)

      • getModelSize

        public int getModelSize()
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Returns the size of the model.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        Size of the model.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.getModelSize()

      • setModelSize

        public void setModelSize(int modelSize)
        Sets the number of elements in the underlying model.
        Parameters:
        modelSize - Number of elements in the underlying model.

      • getMaxPage

        public int getMaxPage()
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Returns the index of the last page. Will always return 0 if paging is disabled.
        Specified by:
        getMaxPage in interface IPaginator
        Returns:
        Index of the last page.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.getMaxPage()

      • inRange

        public boolean inRange(int modelIndex)
        Returns true if the model index falls within the current page. If the paginator is disabled, will always return true.
        Parameters:
        modelIndex - The model index.
        Returns:
        True if the index falls within the current page.

      • getModelOffset

        public int getModelOffset(int pageIndex)
        Returns the index of the first model element on the specified page. If the paginator is disabled, will always return 0. If the page index exceeds the maximum page index, will return one more than the total number of model elements.
        Parameters:
        pageIndex - The page index.
        Returns:
        The index of the first model element on the page.

      • addEventListener

        public boolean addEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Register a listener to receive events when a setting changes.
        Specified by:
        addEventListener in interface IPaginator
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.
        Returns:
        True if the listener was registered. False if already registered.
        See Also:
        IPaginator.addEventListener(org.fujion.model.IPaginator.IPagingListener)

      • removeAllListeners

        public void removeAllListeners()
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Removes all listeners.
        Specified by:
        removeAllListeners in interface IPaginator
        See Also:
        IPaginator.removeAllListeners()

      • removeEventListener

        public boolean removeEventListener(IPaginator.IPagingListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: IPaginator
        Removes a single event listener.
        Specified by:
        removeEventListener in interface IPaginator
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the listener was removed. False if it was not registered.
        See Also:
